pages.text: Many instruments in can be $(o)tuned$() to have a sound that is slightly (or in some cases significantly) different than their original sound.$(br2)To tune a tunable instrument you'll first need to craft a Tuning Table:

pages.title: Using the Table
pages.text: To use the Tuning Table, insert a tunable instrument into the left-hand slot and corresponding tuning modifier into the right-hand slot. The resulting tuned instrument can then be removed from the output slot (it will keep its MIDI Settings and dye color).$(br2)A list of tunable instruments and their supported modifiers can be found on the next page, or in JEI if it is installed.
